title: The Future of JavaScript
description: A deep dive into the latest features and upcoming changes in the JavaScript language.

title: Building Scalable APIs with Node.js
description: Learn how to design and build robust and scalable APIs using Node.js and Express.

title: CSS Grid and Flexbox for Modern Layouts
description: Master the power of CSS Grid and Flexbox to create complex and responsive web layouts with ease.

title: Introduction to Machine Learning with TensorFlow.js
description: Get started with machine learning in the browser using TensorFlow.js.

title: The Art of Debugging
description: Learn effective debugging techniques and tools to quickly find and fix bugs in your code.

title: WebAssembly: The Next Frontier
description: An introduction to WebAssembly and how it can be used to run high-performance code in the browser.
